column1: # The rainfall sheet for this gauge for 1910-1919 is missing from the Met Office archive volumes.
# Annual totals (possibly estimates) for 1910-1919 have been taken from British Rainfall almanacs for these years.
# Nov-Dec 1903: 29.55 minus 0.75 allocated to early January 1904
# Some readings are shown bracketed without explanation, and have been omitted as likely estimates from other sites:
